name: JoinKind
desc: An operation type that joins two data frame types.

items.name: static func == (JoinKind, JoinKind) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

items.name: case full
items.desc: A join kind that contains every row from both data frame types.

items.name: case inner
items.desc: A join kind that only contains rows with matching values in both data frame types.

items.name: case left
items.desc: A join kind that contains all rows from the left data frame type, and only the rows with matching values from the right data frame type.

items.name: case right
items.desc: A join kind that contains all rows from the right data frame type, and only the rows with matching values from the left data frame type.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
